column4: here is the situation.  My wireless works fine for about 24 hours and then it just stops.  As soon as i type int he wep key again, it starts back up.  How can i fix this?
maybe you have a time-limit in your accesspoint/router
I do not becuase I have 2 windows computers and one mac that continue to get wireless internet from the same router...
good. at least you know it is connected to this one machine.
